room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Escape This Live in Frederick
review: Did a girls night here in the Mob Boss room and had SO much fun. Fantastic activity for friends, families, or as a team building exercise. Will definitely go back to try the other room sometime - well worth the price.

room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Escape This Live in Frederick
review: I've done a few escape rooms before, but nothing compared to the quality of these rooms! The "Mob Boss" room was very well developed, challenging and unique. The staff was amazing and very helpful! Definitely recommend to any escape room enthusiast! We can't wait to go back and try their other room!

room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Escape This Live in Frederick
review: One of the best escape rooms I've been to. I can't wait to come back. We were one puzzle away from solving the Mob Boss room! Next time I'm in town, we're doing the Mad Scientist. The location is also great with a ton of parking.
